title: Veganerie Bakery - Mercury Ville
description: Vegan bakery on the 4th floor of Mercury Ville department store, est. since 2013; has a 2nd shop at EmQuartier. Offers a varied range of freshly baked vegan pastries and sweets in addition to coconut ice cream and coffee drinks; waffles and granola in the morning. Try the vegan brownie or cinnamon roll.
streetAddress: 4F Mercury Ville, Chitlom BTS, Lang Suan St
